title: Universidad INCA
content:
Hi friends

Please help me ID these fonts used in the text universidad INCA

Thanks in advance

Hernando

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [UNIVERSIDAD.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150318013442/http:/typophile.com/files/UNIVERSIDAD.jpg) | 94.6 KB |
author: hernando

comments.content:
You are posting at the OLD Type ID board.

Next time use the new one: [Font ID](http://web.archive.org/web/20150318013442/http:/typophile.com/typeid).

Anyway, the fonts are [Amazone](http://web.archive.org/web/20150318013442/http:/www.identifont.com/show?21Y) and [Post Antiqua](http://web.archive.org/web/20150318013442/http:/www.identifont.com/show?U8).
